settings.fullinfotext: Prepping for the big day? We’re sure you picked the best venue, bought the latest bridal outfit, and updated your wedding playlist with all the trending songs. Following the same pattern, you might want to go for some trendy pieces of Indian bridal jewelry to adorn your outfit, or timeless pieces with a modern touch. If you don’t know where to start, we’ll help you out.

While classic jewelry designs are timeless, incorporating trending elements in your bridal jewelry can add a modern and fashionable touch to your overall look. Here’s everything you need to know about popular Indian bridal jewelry ideas this year and how you can incorporate them into your bridal look.

settings.infotext:
The ancient form of jewelry-making that originated in Rajasthan and embellished the Mughal royalty has been very popular among brides. Kundan jewelry is a great choice when choosing Indian bridal jewelry because of the traditional look and feel that it brings along with its exquisite shine.

Kundan jewelry pairs up brilliantly with Indian bridal attire and makes up for great statement pieces. A necklace or choker set in kundan can take the bridal look to a whole new level. You can always pick something with vibrant gemstones and polki to create something unique and captivating.

We often find brides layering necklaces to create a distinct bridal look. A great substitute here would be a necklace that comes in layers by default.

A panchlada or satlada haar is a layered necklace containing five and seven layers respectively. If you don’t want to mix up different pieces of Indian bridal jewelry and want your statement piece to take center stage, a panchlada or satlada haar is the perfect piece. Pair up the piece with a simple bridal outfit and subtle pieces of Indian bridal jewelry and you’ll create a minimal bridal look that will surely steal the spotlight.

Polki, or uncut diamonds, are a popular choice for Indian bridal jewelry. For a bride who wants to embrace her cultural heritage, polki is the perfect choice. Polki jewelry has a shine and a vintage charm that nothing else can match.

The best thing about polki sets is their versatility. It can be paired well with a variety of outfits and styles and works incredibly well with both Indian and Western attires. Polki jewelry can be paired well with other pieces of Indian bridal jewelry and works flawlessly with almost all shades. From statement necklaces to dainty bracelets, polki can enhance every piece and make it timeless. With polki jewelry, every look you create will be new and unique.

For people who want their bridal look to have a little more color, meenakari jewelry is a great choice. It is the best way to add more vibrancy and flavor to the bridal attire. The Rajasthani technique gives the pieces of Indian bridal jewelry a regal look and makes them more versatile and glamorous.

Meenakari jewelry is highly customizable and can be crafted to suit the individual tastes and preferences of the bride. It is sure to amp up any bridal outfit and can easily become an heirloom piece.

If you’re looking for Indian bridal jewelry that will stay new forever, pick something encrusted with gemstones. Gemstones add sparkle to every piece and make it special. With gemstones, you can pick the colors that go best with your bridal attire. Be it necklaces, bracelets, earrings, or chokers, gemstones add a unique touch of elegance and luxury to every piece. You can pair your gemstone-encrusted Indian bridal jewelry with pearls and polki sets to enhance the look.

settings.fullinfotext:
With these Indian bridal jewelry ideas, you’ll be able to create an interesting and captivating bridal look for your big day.

Take a look at our collection and you’ll find some timeless pieces of Indian bridal jewelry that are sure to make you feel like royalty on your special day. If you need a hand styling your exquisite pieces, do get in touch with us and we’ll be happy to help.
